functions.createTourDescription: Make the best of your trip! Create city tours for each day of travel to visit all major attractions efficiently. See the route you have to travel and no longer be afraid of getting los
functions.shareWithFriends: Share your trips with your firends
functions.shareWithFriendsDescription: Share planned routes with your travel companions so you can decide on plans together.
functions.history: Store the history of your travels
functions.historyDescription: See how many places you have already visited. Take a look at the statistics - Which countries are the most visited? Have you already visited all the continents? Which year was the most popular for travel?

main.planTrip: Plan your trip with Trip Companion!
main.mainDescription: Choose the attractions you want to visit and create a route between them. Share it with your friends. Travel statistics will be the motivation to discover the world!
main.planDescription: Thanks to Trip Companion, planning a trip will stop being a difficult task and will become a pleasure
main.createTourShortDescription: Select the attractions you want to visit on each day of the trip and see the route you need to travel.
main.shareWithFriendsShortDescription: Invite friends you travel with and share your routes with them.
main.historyShortDescription: Take a look at the statistics of your expeditions and observe the countries and continents you visited.
